message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at $11,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal, considering the product's intrinsic value to you stands at $10,000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product to life in your hands.
